question:
33. Rearrange these sentences into a good paragraph!    (1) Jack had an accident a few days ago
(2) Jill went to the Hospital to visit him
(3) He is still in the hospital now
(4) She is at hospital now
(5) He had to go to the hospital​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

(1),(5),(3),(2),(4)

Penjelasan:

1.jack mengalami kecelakaan beberapa hari yang lalu

5.dia harus pergi ke RS

3.dia(laki laki) masih di rumah sakit sekarang

2.jill pergi ke RS untuk mengunjunginya(laki laki)

4.dia(perempuan) di RS sekarang

related_questions.question: To moisten the food, our bodies produce…. to moisten the food, our bodies produce….

2. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat possitive degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu.    3. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat comparative degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu
 4. Pilih 5 pertanyaan d bawah ini, jawablah dengam kalimat superlative degree.
 Questions
 1. Which flower has the most /the worst fragrance?
 2. What is the longest/shortest river in the world?
 3. Who is the heaviest/lightest man in the world?
 4. Which is the smallest/biggest animal in the world?
 5. Which animal does have the slowest/fastest movement?
 6. What is the cheapest/the most expensive thing in the world?
 7. What is the most popular activity during pandemic?
 8. Who is the oldest man in the world?

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat positive degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu.

a. My smartphone is as sophisticated as my laptop.

b. My car is as expensive as my uncle's car.

c. My bicycle is as new as my neighbor's bicycle.

d. My room is as clean as a hotel's room.

e. My books are as important as my professor's books.

3. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat comparative degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu

a. My laptop is more expensive than my smart phone.

b. My car is more expensive than my motorcycle.

c. My neighbor's bicycle is cheaper than my bicycle.

d. My room is more comfortable than a hotel's room.

e. My books are more important than my toys.

4. Pilih 5 pertanyaan d bawah ini, jawablah dengam kalimat superlative degree.

Questions

1. Which flower has the most /the worst fragrance?

I think Jasmine flowers have the most fragrance.

I think Rafflesia Arnoldii has the worst fragrance.

2. What is the longest/shortest river in the world?

The Nile River is the longest river in the world.

The Roe River is the shortest river in the world.

3. Who is the heaviest/lightest man in the world?

Franco is the heaviest man in the world.

Junrey Balawing is the lightest man in the world.

4. Which is the smallest/biggest animal in the world?

The biggest animal in the world is Antarctic Blue Whale.

The smallest animal in the world is Etruscan shrew.

5. Which animal does have the slowest/fastest movement?

Cheetahs have the fastest movement of all animals.

Snails have the slowest movement of all animals.

6. What is the cheapest/the most expensive thing in the world?

A Lamborghini is the most expensive thing in the world.

Wheat is the cheapest thing in the world.

7. What is the most popular activity during pandemic?

The most popular activity during pandemic is making contents on social media.

8. Who is the oldest man in the world?

Kane Tanaka from Japan is the oldest man in the world. He was born in 1903.

Penjelasan:

Rumus Degrees of Comparison:

Terdapat tiga tingkat perbandingan untuk kata sifat dan kata keterangan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu:

Positive degree

Comparative degree

Superlative degree

Positive degree digunakan untuk menyatakan sesuatu dalam keadaan selevel:

Contoh : I am as happy as my parents. (Aku sebahagia kedua orang tuaku)

Comparative degree dibentuk dengan menambahkan akhiran "-er"

Contoh : Tony is younger than i am. (Tony lebih muda dariku)

Superlative degree dengan menambahkan akhiran "-est" dan memiliki arti sebagai yang paling sehingga tidak bisa dibandingkan lagi.

Contoh : I am the youngest person in my family. (Aku adalah orang termuda / yang paling muda di dalam keluargaku)

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)
